act_pit.actname: Canadian Pacific Railway (Stone and Timber) Settlement Act

change.changenote: Section 11 BEFORE repealed by 2014-27-11, effective December 22, 2016 [2 years after s. 11 coming into force].

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Lieutenant Governor in Council may, by regulation, do one or more of the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: prescribe additional railway lands by adding items to the Schedule;
amend the district lot numbers set out in Column 1 of the Schedule;
amend the land district names, or the division names of the land districts, set out in Column 2 of the Schedule.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A regulation made under this section may be made retroactive to the date this section comes into force or a later date, and if made retroactive is deemed to have come into force on the specified date.
This section is repealed 2 years after the date this section comes into force.
